l. Short title and commencement.-( 1) This Ordinance may be
called the Societies Registration (Second Amendment) Ordinance, 2005.
(2) It shall come into force at once.
"21. Registration of Deeni Madaris.-(l) All Deeni Madaris by
whatsoever name called shall not operate without getting themselves
registered as undel namely:-
(i) The Deeni Madaris existing before the commencement of the
Societies Registration (Second Amendment) Ordinarce, 2005,
ifnot aheady registered shall get themselves registered under
this Act upto the 3lst December,2005; and
(ii) The Deeni Madaris which are established aftcr the commence-
ment of the Societies Registration (Second Amendment)
Ordinance, 2005, shall get themselves registercd within one year
of their establishment.
Explanation.-4ne Deeni Maddrassah having more than one
campus shall need only one registration.
(2) Every Deeni Maddrassah shall submit annual report ofits educational
activities to the Regisu-ar.
(3) Every Deeni Maddrassah shall cause to be carried out audit of its
accounts by an Auditor and submit a copy of its audit report to the
Registrar.
(4) No Deeni Maddrassah shall teach or publish any literature which
promotes militancy or spreads sectarianism or religious hatred:
